Posts.Title: waiting on results for excision biopsy glitz moth

Posts.Content: glitz wrote: I had surgery on 3/30. My post op is on 4/5. Took off the bandage today to shower / change and I'm more upset at my incision right now than any possible results. It's about 2 inches long, on the outside of my breast but doesn't go along the curve of my breast. It's horizontal. I feel disfigured and dumb because there could be more wrong but I'm crying about looking hideous Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: waiting on results for excision biopsy glitz moth

Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2018 12:47PM glitz wrote: It was benign. They were able to remove the entire lesion. Thanks everyone!
Posts.Title: waiting on results for excision biopsy glitz moth

Posts.Content: Apr 2, 2018 11:03PM glitz wrote: Thanks to everyone who replied. I appreciate all the tips and kind words. I will hopefully have more info during my post op appointment on Thurs 4/5.
Posts.Title: waiting on results for excision biopsy glitz moth

Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2018 10:25PM glitz wrote: Not too late to ice it at all! I had my excision biopsy on 3/30 and I'm still achy and sore on and off. Sports bras really help. Walmart has a Danskin brand that has a zipper front and it has been such a help. I had bought some back closing sports bras but material is more irritating. I've also been sleeping sitting up and that seems to help too. Good luck
